physical_appearance: This is a Cartridge Kodak roll film camera. It is closed in a form of a rectangular box, with a handle attached at the top. The front of the camera has a lid at the front that can be opened outwards to reveal the lens and view finder. The body of the camera is covered in black leather.
sgcool_label_text: This is a Cartridge Kodak roll film camera with rubber pneumatic bulb and film spool. Before the advent of the portable camera in the late 19th century, the taking of photographs was limited to the studio. However portable cameras remained affordable only to the rich until the first decades of the 20th century.
